trans-unit.source: Represents an XML document.
trans-unit.target: 表示 XML 文档。

trans-unit.source: You can use this class to load, validate, edit, add, and position XML in a document.
trans-unit.target: 可使用此类在文档中加载、验证、编辑、添加和放置 XML。

trans-unit.source: The class is an in-memory representation of an XML document.
trans-unit.target: 类是 XML 文档的内存中表示。

trans-unit.source: It implements the W3C [XML Document Object Model (DOM)](~/docs/standard/data/xml/xml-document-object-model-dom.md) Level 1 Core and the Core DOM Level 2.
trans-unit.target: 它实现 W3C [XML 文档对象模型 (DOM)](~/docs/standard/data/xml/xml-document-object-model-dom.md)级别 1 核心和核心 DOM 级别 2。

trans-unit.source: *DOM* stands for *document object model*.
trans-unit.target: *DOM*代表*文档对象模型*。

trans-unit.source: To read more about it, see [XML Document Object Model (DOM)](~/docs/standard/data/xml/xml-document-object-model-dom.md).
trans-unit.target: 若要了解更多有关它，请参阅[XML 文档对象模型 (DOM)](~/docs/standard/data/xml/xml-document-object-model-dom.md)。

trans-unit.source: You can load XML into the DOM by using the <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> class, and then programmatically read, modify, and remove XML in the document.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过将 XML 加载到 DOM<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>类，以及然后以编程方式读取、 修改和删除 XML 文档中。

trans-unit.source: If you want to pry open the <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> class and see how it’s implemented, see the [Reference Source](https://referencesource.microsoft.com/#System.Xml/Xml/System/Xml/Dom/XmlDocument.cs#f82a4c1bd1f0ee12).
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要将其撬打开<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>类，请参阅如何实现，请参阅[引用源](https://referencesource.microsoft.com/#System.Xml/Xml/System/Xml/Dom/XmlDocument.cs#f82a4c1bd1f0ee12)。

trans-unit.source: Load XML into the document object model
trans-unit.target: 将 XML 加载到文档对象模型

trans-unit.source: Start with an XML document like this one.
trans-unit.target: 启动与 XML 文档与此类似。

trans-unit.source: It’s just a few books in a collection.
trans-unit.target: 它是在集合中的几个丛书。

trans-unit.source: But it does contain the basic things that you’d find in any XML document; a namespace, elements that represent data and attributes that describe the data.
trans-unit.target: 但它包含你将会发现任何 XML 文档; 中的基本内容命名空间、 表示数据的元素和特性用于描述数据。

trans-unit.source: Next, load this data into the DOM so that you can work with it in memory.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，此数据加载到 DOM，以便可以在内存中使用它。

trans-unit.source: The most popular way to do this is refer to a file on your local computer or on a network.
trans-unit.target: 执行此操作的最常用方法是指向本地计算机上或在网络上的文件。

trans-unit.source: This example loads XML from a file.
trans-unit.target: 此示例从文件加载 XML。

trans-unit.source: If the file doesn’t exist, it just generates some XML and loads that.
trans-unit.target: 如果文件不存在，它只需生成一些 XML，然后加载的。

trans-unit.source: **Complete sample:** [Manipulate XML in-Memory by using the XmlDocument class and other related types](https://code.msdn.microsoft.com/windowsdesktop/Manipulate-XML-in-memory-4b612d6b/view/SourceCode)
trans-unit.target: **完整的示例：** [操作内存中 XML 使用 XmlDocument 类和其他相关类型](https://code.msdn.microsoft.com/windowsdesktop/Manipulate-XML-in-memory-4b612d6b/view/SourceCode)

trans-unit.source: **Learn more:** [Reading an XML Document into the DOM](~/docs/standard/data/xml/reading-an-xml-document-into-the-dom.md)
trans-unit.target: **了解详细信息：** [XML 文档读入 DOM](~/docs/standard/data/xml/reading-an-xml-document-into-the-dom.md)

trans-unit.source: Validate it against a schema
trans-unit.target: 根据架构进行验证

trans-unit.source: Start with an XML schema like this one.
trans-unit.target: 启动具有与此类似的 XML 架构。

trans-unit.source: This schema defines the data types in the XML and which attributes are required.
trans-unit.target: 此架构的 XML 中定义的数据类型并且需要哪些属性。

trans-unit.source: Create an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object by using your schema, and then load that object into the DOM.
trans-unit.target: 创建<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>使用您的架构对象，然后将该对象加载到 DOM

trans-unit.source: Create an event handler that executes when code attempts to modify your XML file in ways that violate the rules of the schema.
trans-unit.target: 创建的事件处理程序执行当代码尝试修改的违反了架构的规则的方式将 XML 文件。

trans-unit.source: These blocks of code show helper methods that do all of this.
trans-unit.target: 这些块的代码显示执行所有这些操作的帮助器方法。

trans-unit.source: **Complete sample:** [Manipulate XML in-Memory by using the XmlDocument class and other related types](https://code.msdn.microsoft.com/windowsdesktop/Manipulate-XML-in-memory-4b612d6b/view/SourceCode)
trans-unit.target: **完整的示例：** [操作内存中 XML 使用 XmlDocument 类和其他相关类型](https://code.msdn.microsoft.com/windowsdesktop/Manipulate-XML-in-memory-4b612d6b/view/SourceCode)

trans-unit.source: **Learn more:** [Validating an XML Document in the DOM](~/docs/standard/data/xml/validating-an-xml-document-in-the-dom.md)
trans-unit.target: **了解详细信息：** [验证 XML 文档在 DOM 中](~/docs/standard/data/xml/validating-an-xml-document-in-the-dom.md)

trans-unit.source: Navigate the document tree
trans-unit.target: 在文档树中导航

trans-unit.source: You can use properties to navigate around an XML document.
trans-unit.target: 属性可用于浏览 XML 文档。

trans-unit.source: But before you use any of them, let’s quickly review a few terms.
trans-unit.target: 但在使用其中任何之前，让我们快速回顾了几个术语。

trans-unit.source: Your document is composed of nodes.
trans-unit.target: 文档由组成节点。

trans-unit.source: Each node has as single *parent* node directly above it.
trans-unit.target: 每个节点都作为单*父*紧靠它的上方的节点。

trans-unit.source: The only node that does not have a parent node is the document root, as it is the top-level node.
trans-unit.target: 没有父节点的唯一节点是文档根，因为它是顶级节点。

trans-unit.source: Most nodes can have *child* nodes, which are nodes directly below them.
trans-unit.target: 大多数节点可以有*子*是相邻的下一级的节点的节点。

trans-unit.source: Nodes that are at the same level are *siblings*.
trans-unit.target: 位于相同级别的节点*同级*。

trans-unit.source: The following examples, show you how to obtain the root node, jump to the first child node of the root node, access any of its child nodes, get back out to the parent node, and then navigate across sibling nodes.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例，演示如何获取根节点、 跳转到根节点的第一个子节点、 访问任何及其子节点、 连接返回到父节点中，和然后同级节点之间导航。

trans-unit.source: **Start with the root node**
trans-unit.target: **启动与根节点**

trans-unit.source: This example gets the root node and then uses that node to output the contents of the document to the console.
trans-unit.target: 此示例获取根节点，，然后使用该节点输出到控制台的文档的内容。

trans-unit.source: **Get child nodes**
trans-unit.target: **获取子节点**

trans-unit.source: This example jumps to the first child node of the root node and then iterates through the child nodes of that node if any exist.
trans-unit.target: 本示例跳转到根节点的第一个子节点，然后如果存在任何，循环访问该节点的子节点。

trans-unit.source: **Get back to the parent node**
trans-unit.target: **回到父节点**

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.ParentNode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.ParentNode%2A> 属性。

trans-unit.source: **Refer to the last child node**
trans-unit.target: **到最后一个引用的子节点**

trans-unit.source: This example writes the price of a book to the console (which is the last child node of a book node).
trans-unit.target: 此示例将写入控制台 （这是 book 节点的最后一个子节点） 的一本书的价格。

trans-unit.source: **Navigate forward across siblings**
trans-unit.target: **跨同级向前定位**

trans-unit.source: This example moves forward from book to book.
trans-unit.target: 此示例将向前移动簿工作簿。

trans-unit.source: Book nodes are siblings to one another.
trans-unit.target: 书节点是同级到另一个。

trans-unit.source: **Navigate backwards across siblings**
trans-unit.target: **向后导航跨同级**

trans-unit.source: This example moves backwards from book to book.
trans-unit.target: 此示例将获取向后从簿工作簿。

trans-unit.source: Find nodes
trans-unit.target: 查找节点

trans-unit.source: The most popular way to find one or more nodes of data is to use an XPath query string, but there are also methods that don’t require one.
trans-unit.target: 若要查找的数据的一个或多个节点的最常用方法是使用 XPath 查询字符串，但也不需要一个的方法。

trans-unit.source: **Get a single node**
trans-unit.target: **获取单个节点**

trans-unit.source: This example locates a book by using the ISBN number.
trans-unit.target: 此示例通过使用 ISBN 编号定位一本书。

trans-unit.source: The string used in this example is an Xpath query.
trans-unit.target: 此示例中使用的字符串为 Xpath 查询。

trans-unit.source: You can find more examples of them here: [XPath examples](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms256086.aspx).
trans-unit.target: 你可以找到更多个示例： [XPath 示例](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms256086.aspx)。

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.GetElementById%2A> to retrieve nodes.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以使用<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.GetElementById%2A>检索节点。

trans-unit.source: To use this approach, you’ll have to define ID’s in the document type definition declarations of your XML file.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此方法，你将需要定义 ID 文档类型定义声明的 XML 文件中。

trans-unit.source: After you get a node, you get the value of attributes or child nodes.
trans-unit.target: 获取节点后，你将收到的特性或子节点的值。

trans-unit.source: This example does that with a book node.
trans-unit.target: 此示例将执行的与 book 节点。

trans-unit.source: **Get a collection of nodes**
trans-unit.target: **获取节点的集合**

trans-unit.source: This example selects all books where the author's last name is **Austen**, and then changes the price of those books.
trans-unit.target: 此示例选择的作者姓氏所在的所有丛书**奥斯汀那个年代**，然后将更改的这些图书的价格。

trans-unit.source: You can also get a collection of nodes by using the name of the node.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用节点的名称，以获取节点的集合。

trans-unit.source: For example, this example gets a collection of all book titles.
trans-unit.target: 例如，此示例将获取所有书名的集合。

trans-unit.source: **Complete sample:** [Manipulate XML in-Memory by using the XmlDocument class and other related types](https://code.msdn.microsoft.com/windowsdesktop/Manipulate-XML-in-memory-4b612d6b/view/SourceCode)
trans-unit.target: **完整的示例：** [操作内存中 XML 使用 XmlDocument 类和其他相关类型](https://code.msdn.microsoft.com/windowsdesktop/Manipulate-XML-in-memory-4b612d6b/view/SourceCode)

trans-unit.source: **Learn more:** [Select Nodes Using XPath Navigation](~/docs/standard/data/xml/select-nodes-using-xpath-navigation.md)
trans-unit.target: **了解详细信息：** [使用 XPath 导航选择节点](~/docs/standard/data/xml/select-nodes-using-xpath-navigation.md)

trans-unit.source: Edit nodes
trans-unit.target: 编辑节点

trans-unit.source: This example edits a book node and its attributes.
trans-unit.target: 此示例通过编辑 book 节点和其属性。

trans-unit.source: **Learn more:** [Modifying Nodes, Content, and Values in an XML Document](~/docs/standard/data/xml/modifying-nodes-content-and-values-in-an-xml-document.md)
trans-unit.target: **了解详细信息：** [修改节点、 内容和 XML 文档中的值](~/docs/standard/data/xml/modifying-nodes-content-and-values-in-an-xml-document.md)

trans-unit.source: **Complete sample:** [Manipulate XML in-Memory by using the XmlDocument class and other related types](https://code.msdn.microsoft.com/windowsdesktop/Manipulate-XML-in-memory-4b612d6b/view/SourceCode)
trans-unit.target: **完整的示例：** [操作内存中 XML 使用 XmlDocument 类和其他相关类型](https://code.msdn.microsoft.com/windowsdesktop/Manipulate-XML-in-memory-4b612d6b/view/SourceCode)

trans-unit.source: Add nodes
trans-unit.target: 添加节点

trans-unit.source: To add a node, use the <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.CreateElement%2A> method or the <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.CreateNode%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要添加节点时，使用<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.CreateElement%2A>方法或<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.CreateNode%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To add a data node such as a book, use the <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.CreateElement%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要添加数据节点，如一本书，使用<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.CreateElement%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: For any other type of node such as a comment, whitespace node, or CDATA node, use the <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.CreateNode%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 对于任何其他类型的节点，例如注释、 空白节点或 CDATA 节点，使用<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.CreateNode%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This example creates a book node, adds attrubutes to that node, and then adds that node to the document.
trans-unit.target: 此示例创建 book 节点，将 attrubutes 添加到该节点，然后将该节点添加到文档。

trans-unit.source: **Complete sample:** [Manipulate XML in-Memory by using the XmlDocument class and other related types](https://code.msdn.microsoft.com/windowsdesktop/Manipulate-XML-in-memory-4b612d6b/view/SourceCode)
trans-unit.target: **完整的示例：** [操作内存中 XML 使用 XmlDocument 类和其他相关类型](https://code.msdn.microsoft.com/windowsdesktop/Manipulate-XML-in-memory-4b612d6b/view/SourceCode)

trans-unit.source: **Learn more:** [Inserting Nodes into an XML Document](~/docs/standard/data/xml/inserting-nodes-into-an-xml-document.md)
trans-unit.target: **了解详细信息：** [将节点插入 XML 文档](~/docs/standard/data/xml/inserting-nodes-into-an-xml-document.md)

trans-unit.source: Remove nodes
trans-unit.target: 删除节点

trans-unit.source: To remove a node, use the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.RemoveChild%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要删除节点，使用<xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.RemoveChild%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This example removes a book from the document and any whitespace that appears just before the book node.
trans-unit.target: 此示例从文档和之前 book 节点将显示任何空格删除一本书。

trans-unit.source: **Complete sample:** [Manipulate XML in-Memory by using the XmlDocument class and other related types](https://code.msdn.microsoft.com/windowsdesktop/Manipulate-XML-in-memory-4b612d6b/view/SourceCode)
trans-unit.target: **完整的示例：** [操作内存中 XML 使用 XmlDocument 类和其他相关类型](https://code.msdn.microsoft.com/windowsdesktop/Manipulate-XML-in-memory-4b612d6b/view/SourceCode)

trans-unit.source: **Learn more:** [Removing Nodes, Content, and Values from an XML Document](~/docs/standard/data/xml/removing-nodes-content-and-values-from-an-xml-document.md)
trans-unit.target: **了解详细信息：** [中移除节点、 内容和从 XML 文档的值](~/docs/standard/data/xml/removing-nodes-content-and-values-from-an-xml-document.md)

trans-unit.source: Position nodes
trans-unit.target: 位置节点

trans-unit.source: You can choose where you want a node to appear in your document by using the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.InsertBefore%2A> and <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.InsertAfter%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 你可以选择想要通过使用显示在文档中的节点<xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.InsertBefore%2A>和<xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.InsertAfter%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This example shows two helper methods.
trans-unit.target: 此示例演示两个帮助器方法。

trans-unit.source: One of them moves a node higher in a list.
trans-unit.target: 其中一个将更高版本的节点列表中。

trans-unit.source: The other one moves a node lower.
trans-unit.target: 较低的节点移动另一个。

trans-unit.source: These methods could be used in an application that enables users to move books up and down in a list of books.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序，使用户能够在的书籍的列表中向上和向下移动丛书中，可以使用这些方法。

trans-unit.source: When a user chooses a book and presses an up or down button, your code could call methods like these to position the corresponding book node before or after other book nodes.
trans-unit.target: 当用户选择一本书并按下向上或向下按钮时，你的代码无法调用这些位置相应的 book 节点之前或之后其他 book 节点等方法。

trans-unit.source: **Complete sample:** [Manipulate XML in-Memory by using the XmlDocument class and other related types](https://code.msdn.microsoft.com/windowsdesktop/Manipulate-XML-in-memory-4b612d6b/view/SourceCode)
trans-unit.target: **完整的示例：** [操作内存中 XML 使用 XmlDocument 类和其他相关类型](https://code.msdn.microsoft.com/windowsdesktop/Manipulate-XML-in-memory-4b612d6b/view/SourceCode)

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDocument" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDocument" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDocument" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDocument" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The following is an example of load-time validation.
trans-unit.target: 下面是加载时验证的示例。

trans-unit.source: A document type definition (DTD) validating <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> is passed to the <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Load%2A> method and a <xref:System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler> is provided to notify users of any validation errors.
trans-unit.target: 文档类型定义 (DTD) 验证<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>传递给<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Load%2A>方法和一个<xref:System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler>提供以通知用户的任何验证错误。

trans-unit.source: In this example a validation error is found, but the document is still loaded.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中为找到的验证错误，但文档仍处于加载状态。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can define a validating <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> to throw an exception and stop the load process when a validation error is found by not specifying the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler>.
trans-unit.target: 或者，可以定义一个验证<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>以引发异常，并通过不指定验证错误时停止加载过程<xref:System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about validating XML data, see the Remarks section of the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> reference page.
trans-unit.target: 有关验证 XML 数据的详细信息，请参阅 <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> 引用页的“备注”部分。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the `bookDTD.xml` file as input.
trans-unit.target: 示例使用 `bookDTD.xml` 文件作为输入。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="XmlImplementation" /> to use.
trans-unit.target: 要使用的 <see langword="XmlImplementation" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see langword="XmlDocument" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlImplementation" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see langword="XmlDocument" /> 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlImplementation" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="XmlNameTable" /> to use.
trans-unit.target: 要使用的 <see langword="XmlNameTable" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see langword="XmlDocument" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNameTable" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see langword="XmlDocument" /> 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNameTable" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets the base URI of the current node.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前节点的基 URI。

trans-unit.source: The location from which the node was loaded.
trans-unit.target: 从其加载节点的位置。

trans-unit.source: A networked XML document is comprised of chunks of data aggregated using various W3C standard inclusion mechanisms and therefore contains nodes that come from different places.
trans-unit.target: 联网的 XML 文档的聚合使用各种 W3C 标准包含机制的数据块组成，因此包含来自不同位置的节点。

trans-unit.source: The `BaseURI` tells you where these nodes came from.
trans-unit.target: `BaseURI`告诉这些节点来自何处。

trans-unit.source: For Document nodes, `BaseURI` returns the location of the XML document.
trans-unit.target: 对于文档节点，`BaseURI`返回 XML 文档的位置。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the `XmlDocument` was loaded using the following call doc.Load("http://server/mydata.xml"), the `BaseURI` for the document node is http://server/mydata.xml.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果`XmlDocument`使用以下调用文档加载的。负载 ("http://server/mydata.xml")，则`BaseURI`文档节点是http://server/mydata.xml。

trans-unit.source: However, if the <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Load%2A> method is redirected by server to a different URI, `BaseURI` returns the original URI passed to the `Load` method.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Load%2A>方法被重定向到不同的 URI，服务器`BaseURI`返回传递到的原始 URI`Load`方法。

trans-unit.source: This property is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM).
trans-unit.target: 此属性是文档对象模型 (DOM) 的 Microsoft 扩展。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to recursively clone the subtree under the specified node; <see langword="false" /> to clone only the node itself.
trans-unit.target: 若要递归地克隆指定节点下的子树，则为 <see langword="true" />；若仅克隆节点本身，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a duplicate of this node.
trans-unit.target: 创建此节点的副本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned <see langword="XmlDocument" /> node.
trans-unit.target: 克隆的 <see langword="XmlDocument" /> 节点。

trans-unit.source: This method serves as a copy constructor for nodes.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可作为节点的复制构造函数。

trans-unit.source: The cloned node has no parent (<xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.ParentNode%2A> returns `null`).
trans-unit.target: 克隆的节点具有没有父级 (<xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.ParentNode%2A>返回`null`)。

trans-unit.source: If `deep` is `true`, the cloned node includes all the child nodes, otherwise only the `XmlDocument` node is cloned.
trans-unit.target: 如果`deep`是`true`，克隆的节点包含所有子节点，否则仅`XmlDocument`克隆节点。

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.CloneNode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to see how this method behaves on other node types.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅<xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.CloneNode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，以便查看此方法在其他节点类型上的行为方式。

trans-unit.source: Creates an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlAttribute" /> with the specified name.

trans-unit.source: The qualified name of the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 属性的限定名称。

trans-unit.source: If the name contains a colon, the <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlNode.Prefix" /> property reflects the part of the name preceding the first colon and the <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlDocument.LocalName" /> property reflects the part of the name following the first colon.
trans-unit.target: 如果名称包含冒号，则 <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlNode.Prefix" /> 属性反映名称中第一个冒号之前的部分，<see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlDocument.LocalName" /> 属性反映名称中第一个冒号之后的部分。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlNode.NamespaceURI" /> remains empty unless the prefix is a recognized built-in prefix such as xmlns.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlNode.NamespaceURI" /> 保持为空，除非该前缀是一个可识别的内置前缀，例如 xmlns。

trans-unit.source: In this case <see langword="NamespaceURI" /> has a value of http://www.w3.org/2000/xmlns/.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下 <see langword="NamespaceURI" /> 的值为 http://www.w3.org/2000/xmlns/。

trans-unit.source: According to the W3C Extensible Markup Language (XML) 1.0 recommendation (www.w3.org/TR/1998/REC-xml-19980210), CDataSection nodes are allowed within Element nodes and in EntityReference nodes when the EntityReference node is not a child of an Attribute node.
trans-unit.target: 根据 W3C 可扩展标记语言 (XML) 1.0 建议 (www.w3.org/TR/1998/REC-xml-19980210) 中，CDataSection 允许节点在元素节点和 EntityReference 节点时 EntityReference 节点不是属性节点的子级.

trans-unit.source: According to the W3C Extensible Markup Language (XML) 1.0 recommendation (www.w3.org/TR/1998/REC-xml-19980210), DocumentType nodes are only allowed within Document nodes.
trans-unit.target: 根据 W3C 可扩展标记语言 (XML) 1.0 建议 (www.w3.org/TR/1998/REC-xml-19980210) 中，文档节点中仅允许 DocumentType 节点。

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> can have only one DocumentType node.
trans-unit.target: 每个<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>可以只能有一个 DocumentType 节点。

trans-unit.source: The DocumentType node must also be inserted before the root element of the `XmlDocument` (if the document already has a root element, you cannot add a DocumentType node).
trans-unit.target: 此外必须在的根元素之前插入 DocumentType 节点`XmlDocument`（如果该文档已有一个根元素，无法添加 DocumentType 节点）。

trans-unit.source: If the passed parameters do not combine to build a valid `XmlDocumentType`, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果传递的参数不合并以生成有效`XmlDocumentType`，将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: According to the W3C Extensible Markup Language (XML) 1.0 recommendation (www.w3.org/TR/1998/REC-xml-19980210), Element nodes are allowed within Document and Element nodes, and in EntityReference nodes when the EntityReference is outside an Attribute node.
trans-unit.target: 根据 W3C 可扩展标记语言 (XML) 1.0 建议 (www.w3.org/TR/1998/REC-xml-19980210) 中，元素节点时，允许在文档和元素节点和 EntityReference 节点 EntityReference 超出属性节点。

trans-unit.source: This method is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM).
trans-unit.target: 此方法是 Microsoft 扩展到文档对象模型 (DOM)。

trans-unit.source: The following example adds a new element to the existing XML document.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例将新元素添加到现有的 XML 文档。

trans-unit.source: The name of the entity reference.
trans-unit.target: 实体引用的名称。

trans-unit.source: Creates an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlEntityReference" /> with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 创建具有指定名称的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlEntityReference" />。

trans-unit.source: The new <see langword="XmlEntityReference" />.
trans-unit.target: 新的 <see langword="XmlEntityReference" />。

trans-unit.source: If the referenced entity is known, the child list of the `XmlEntityReference` node is made the same as that of the corresponding <xref:System.Xml.XmlEntity> node.
trans-unit.target: 如果被引用的实体已知的的子列表`XmlEntityReference`节点进行相同的相应<xref:System.Xml.XmlEntity>节点。

trans-unit.source: The namespaces used in the replacement text for the entity reference are bound at the time the parent of the entity reference node is first set (for example, when the entity reference node is inserted into the document).
trans-unit.target: 实体引用的替换文本中使用的命名空间绑定在实体引用节点的父级第一次设置 （例如，如果实体引用节点插入到文档中） 的时间。

trans-unit.source: For example, given the following entity:
trans-unit.target: 例如，给定以下实体：

trans-unit.source: If you call `CreateEntityReference("a")` you get back a single node of type EntityReference with no children.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用`CreateEntityReference("a")`则将取回类型 EntityReference 的单个节点无子项的。

trans-unit.source: If you append this node as a child of the following node,
trans-unit.target: 如果将此节点追加的以下节点的子级

trans-unit.source: then, at the time of calling <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.AppendChild%2A>, the parent of the newly created entity reference node is set and the children are expanded in this namespace context.
trans-unit.target: 然后，在调用时<xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.AppendChild%2A>、 设置新创建的实体引用节点的父级和子级在此命名空间上下文中扩展。

trans-unit.source: The child element node `b` will have NamespaceURI equal to `urn:1`.
trans-unit.target: 子元素节点`b`将具有 NamespaceURI 等于`urn:1`。

trans-unit.source: The child nodes of the entity reference remain the same even if you move the entity reference to a place in the document that has a different default namespace context.
trans-unit.target: 即使移动到具有不同的默认命名空间上下文的文档中的位置的实体引用的实体引用的子节点保持不变。

trans-unit.source: This does not happen for existing entity reference nodes when you remove and insert them or for entity references that you clone with <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.CloneNode%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 这不会发生对于现有的实体引用节点或删除并将它们插入的实体引用克隆与时<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.CloneNode%2A>。

trans-unit.source: It only happens for newly created entity references.
trans-unit.target: 它仅对新创建的实体引用时发生。

trans-unit.source: If the corresponding entity is not defined in the DocumentType when the entity reference node is added, because the entity reference is not defined, its only child node will be an empty text node.
trans-unit.target: 如果相应的实体中未定义 DocumentType 添加实体引用节点，因为未定义实体引用，其唯一的子节点将空文本节点。

trans-unit.source: The built-in entities amp, lt, gt, apos, and quot are also allowed, and they will have a child text node with the appropriate expanded character value.
trans-unit.target: 此外允许内置实体 amp、 lt、 gt、 a p o s 和 q u o t，并且它们将具有相应的扩展的字符值的子文本节点。

trans-unit.source: Although this method creates the new object in the context of the document, it does not automatically add the new object to the document tree.
trans-unit.target: 尽管此方法在文档的上下文中创建新的对象，它不会自动添加新的对象到文档树。

trans-unit.source: To add the new object, you must explicitly call one of the node insert methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要添加新的对象，必须显式调用的节点插入方法之一。

trans-unit.source: According to the W3C Extensible Markup Language (XML) 1.0 recommendation (www.w3.org/TR/1998/REC-xml-19980210), EntityReference nodes are only allowed within Element, Attribute and EntityReference nodes.
trans-unit.target: 根据 W3C 可扩展标记语言 (XML) 1.0 建议 (www.w3.org/TR/1998/REC-xml-19980210) 中，元素、 属性和 EntityReference 节点中仅允许 EntityReference 节点。

trans-unit.source: It is used when you want to manually format your document.

trans-unit.source: Although this method creates the new object in the context of the document, it does not automatically add the new object to the document tree.
trans-unit.target: 尽管此方法在文档的上下文中创建新的对象，它不会自动添加新的对象到文档树。

trans-unit.target: 下面的示例将添加到文档的空白区域。

trans-unit.source: The version must be "1.0".
trans-unit.target: 版本必须为“1.0”。

trans-unit.source: The value of the encoding attribute.
trans-unit.target: 编码属性的值。

trans-unit.source: This is the encoding that is used when you save the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDocument" /> to a file or a stream; therefore, it must be set to a string supported by the <see cref="T:System.Text.Encoding" /> class, otherwise <see cref="M:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Save(System.String)" /> fails.
trans-unit.target: 这是当将 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDocument" /> 保存到文件或流时使用的编码方式；因此必须将其设置为 <see cref="T:System.Text.Encoding" /> 类支持的字符串，否则 <see cref="M:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Save(System.String)" /> 失败。

trans-unit.source: If this is <see langword="null" /> or String.Empty, the <see langword="Save" /> method does not write an encoding attribute on the XML declaration and therefore the default encoding, UTF-8, is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果这是 <see langword="null" /> 或 String.Empty，则 <see langword="Save" /> 方法不在 XML 声明上写出编码方式特性，因此将使用默认的编码方式 UTF-8。

trans-unit.source: Note: If the <see langword="XmlDocument" /> is saved to either a <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" /> or an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlTextWriter" />, this encoding value is discarded.
trans-unit.target: 注意：如果将 <see langword="XmlDocument" /> 保存到 <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlTextWriter" />，则放弃该编码值。

trans-unit.source: Instead, the encoding of the <see langword="TextWriter" /> or the <see langword="XmlTextWriter" /> is used.
trans-unit.target: 而改用 <see langword="TextWriter" /> 或 <see langword="XmlTextWriter" /> 的编码方式。

trans-unit.source: This ensures that the XML written out can be read back using the correct encoding.
trans-unit.target: 这会确保可以使用正确的编码读回写出的 XML。

trans-unit.source: The value must be either "yes" or "no".
trans-unit.target: 该值必须是“yes”或“no”。

trans-unit.source: If this is <see langword="null" /> or String.Empty, the <see langword="Save" /> method does not write a standalone attribute on the XML declaration.
trans-unit.target: 如果这是 <see langword="null" /> 或 String.Empty，<see langword="Save" /> 方法不在 XML 声明上写出独立特性。

trans-unit.source: Creates an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDeclaration" /> node with the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个具有指定值的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDeclaration" /> 节点。

trans-unit.source: The attributes are exposed as special properties on the `XmlDeclaration` node, and not as <xref:System.Xml.XmlAttribute> nodes.
trans-unit.target: 该属性公开为特殊属性上`XmlDeclaration`节点，而不是作为<xref:System.Xml.XmlAttribute>节点。

trans-unit.source: Although this method creates the new object in the context of the document, it does not automatically add the new object to the document tree.

trans-unit.source: According to the W3C Extensible Markup Language (XML) 1.0 recommendation (www.w3.org/TR/1998/REC-xml-19980210), the `XmlDeclaration` node must be the first node in the document.
trans-unit.target: 根据 W3C 可扩展标记语言 (XML) 1.0 建议 (www.w3.org/TR/1998/REC-xml-19980210)`XmlDeclaration`节点必须是在文档中的第一个节点。

Gets the node containing the DOCTYPE declaration.
trans-unit.target: 获取包含 DOCTYPE 声明的节点。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNode" /> containing the DocumentType (DOCTYPE declaration).
trans-unit.target: 包含 DocumentType（DOCTYPE 声明）的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNode" />。

trans-unit.source: An `XmlDocument` can have one and only one child with <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeType> equal to DocumentType.
trans-unit.target: `XmlDocument`只能有一个且仅有一个子与<xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeType>等于 DocumentType。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是只读的。

trans-unit.target: 若要更改 DocumentType 节点，删除现有节点，创建一个新的一个使用<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.CreateDocumentType%2A>方法，并将新节点添加到文档。

trans-unit.target: 如果文档包含具有匹配 ID 的多个元素，此方法将返回文档中的第一个匹配元素。

trans-unit.source: The DOM implementation must have information which defines which attributes are of type ID.
trans-unit.target: DOM 实现必须具有信息定义哪些属性属于类型 id。

trans-unit.source: Although attributes of type ID can be defined in either XSD schemas or DTDs, this version of the product only supports those defined in DTDs.
trans-unit.target: 虽然可以在 XSD 架构或 Dtd 中定义的类型 ID 的属性，但此版本的产品仅支持那些 Dtd 中定义。

trans-unit.source: Attributes with the name "ID" are not of type ID unless so defined in the DTD.
trans-unit.target: 具有"ID"不是名称的属性类型 ID，除非因此 DTD 中定义。

trans-unit.source: Implementations where it is unknown whether the attributes are of type ID are expected to return `null`.
trans-unit.target: 其中是未知的类型 ID 是否包含以下属性的实现都应该返回`null`。

trans-unit.source: Imports a node from another document to the current document.
trans-unit.target: 将节点从另一个文档导入到当前文档。

trans-unit.source: The imported <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNode" />.
trans-unit.target: 导入的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNode" />。

trans-unit.source: The returned node has no parent.
trans-unit.target: 返回的节点都有没有父级。

trans-unit.source: The source node is not altered or removed from the original document; `ImportNode` creates a copy of the source node.
trans-unit.target: 源节点未更改或删除从原始文档;`ImportNode`创建源节点的副本。

trans-unit.source: Importing a node creates an `XmlNode` object owned by the importing document, with <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.Name%2A> and <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.NodeType%2A> identical to the source node.
trans-unit.target: 导入节点创建`XmlNode`对象拥有的导入的文档，与<xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.Name%2A>和<xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.NodeType%2A>与源节点相同。

trans-unit.source: The new object also has the attributes related to namespaces (<xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.Prefix%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.LocalName%2A>, and <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.NamespaceURI%2A>).
trans-unit.target: 新对象还具有与命名空间相关的属性 (<xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.Prefix%2A>， <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.LocalName%2A>，和<xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.NamespaceURI%2A>)。

trans-unit.source: Depending on the node type of the imported node and the value of the `deep` parameter, additional information is copied as appropriate.
trans-unit.target: 具体取决于导入的节点和值的节点类型`deep`将复制适当的参数，其他信息。

trans-unit.source: This method attempts to mirror the behavior expected if a fragment of XML or HTML source was copied from one document to another (recognizing that, in the XML case, the two documents could have different DTDs).
trans-unit.target: 此方法尝试的镜像预期的行为，如果 XML 或 HTML 源代码片断从一个文档复制到另一个 （认识到，在 XML 的情况下，两个文档可能具有不同 Dtd）。

trans-unit.source: `InnerXml` removes redundant namespace declarations.
trans-unit.target: `InnerXml` 删除多余的命名空间声明。

trans-unit.source: As a result, numerous cut and paste operations do not increase the size of your document with redundant namespace declarations.
trans-unit.target: 因此，大量的剪切和粘贴操作并不会使文档的大小因多余的命名空间声明而增加。

trans-unit.source: Consider the following XSL document:

trans-unit.source: The `InnerXml` property on the stylesheet node returns the following string:
trans-unit.target: `InnerXml`样式表节点上的属性将返回以下字符串：

trans-unit.source: Notice the additional xmlns:xsl namespace declaration which is used to preserve the node identity.
trans-unit.target: 请注意其他 xmlns:xsl 命名空间声明用于保留节点标识。

trans-unit.source: If you re-insert this inner XML string, you will get back your original document.
trans-unit.target: 如果你重新插入此内部的 XML 字符串，将获取原始文档。

trans-unit.source: In other words, `InnerXml` recognizes that the xmlns:xsl namespace declaration is redundant, given that the parent xsl:stylesheet element already has the xmlns:xsl namespace delcaration, and therefore removes it.
trans-unit.target: 换而言之，`InnerXml`意识到 xmlns:xsl 命名空间声明是冗余的假设父 xsl:stylesheet 元素已具有 xmlns:xsl 命名空间 delcaration，并将其删除。

trans-unit.source: Cutting and pasting `InnerXml` among documents that do not use namespaces is clean and simple and does not create "xmlns" redundancy in your strings.
trans-unit.target: 剪切和粘贴`InnerXml`在不使用的文档之间命名空间是干净、 简单和不会在您的字符串创建"xmlns"冗余。

trans-unit.source: `InnerXml` can also be used to cut and paste between documents which have more than one namespace (that is XSL stylesheets).
trans-unit.target: `InnerXml` 此外可进行剪切和粘贴之间具有多个命名空间 （即 XSL 样式表） 的文档。

trans-unit.source: xmlns:xsl declarations automatically appear in your strings and disappear in your node hierarchies.
trans-unit.target: xmlns:xsl 声明自动显示在您的字符串，在节点层次结构中消失。

trans-unit.source: Before you save the document, you must add a root level element, otherwise <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Save%2A> will throw an exception.

trans-unit.source: If the reader is positioned on a leaf node that is invalid for the root level of a document, for example a white space or attribute node, the reader continues to read until it is positioned on a node that can be used for the root.

trans-unit.target: 若要查看描述为每个节点类型返回的名称的表，请参阅<xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.Name%2A>中的属性<xref:System.Xml.XmlNode>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNameTable" /> associated with this implementation.
trans-unit.target: 获取与此实现关联的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNameTable" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see langword="XmlNameTable" /> enabling you to get the atomized version of a string within the document.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="XmlNameTable" />，它使您能够获取该文档中字符串的原子化版本。

trans-unit.source: Each `XmlDocument` object has a <xref:System.Xml.NameTable> object.
trans-unit.target: 每个`XmlDocument`对象具有<xref:System.Xml.NameTable>对象。

trans-unit.source: Element and attribute names are stored in the `NameTable` as atomized strings.
trans-unit.target: 元素和属性名称存储在`NameTable`作为原子化字符串。

trans-unit.source: This means that even if a name is referenced in the document multiple times it is stored only once in the `NameTable`.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着，即使名称引用文档中多次它存储一次在`NameTable`。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the document had multiple elements with the name "Customer", `NameTable` returns the same object whenever it receives a request for that name.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果文档具有多个具有名称"客户"元素`NameTable`在收到该名称的请求返回相同的对象。

trans-unit.source: As a result, users can write code using object comparisons on these strings rather than the more expensive string comparisons.
trans-unit.target: 因此，用户可以编写代码上这些字符串，而不是开销更大的字符串比较中使用对象比较。

trans-unit.source: For more information on atomized strings, see <xref:System.Xml.XmlNameTable>.
trans-unit.target: 有关原子化字符串的详细信息，请参阅 <xref:System.Xml.XmlNameTable>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlNode.Value" /> of a node belonging to this document has been changed.
trans-unit.target: 当属于该文档的节点的 <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlNode.Value" /> 已被更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event only applies to nodes that have a value.
trans-unit.target: 此事件仅适用于具有值的节点。

trans-unit.source: All nodes created by this document, whether or not they have been inserted into the document, are included in this event.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况将包含指示已插入到文档中，它们由本文档中，创建的所有节点。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlNode.Value" /> of a node belonging to this document is about to be changed.
trans-unit.target: 当属于该文档的节点的 <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlNode.Value" /> 将被更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event allows the user to do extra checking and, if necessary, throw an exception to stop the operation.
trans-unit.target: 此事件将允许用户执行额外的检查，并如有必要，引发异常来停止该操作。

trans-unit.source: If an exception is thrown the `XmlDocument` returns to its original state.
trans-unit.target: 如果引发异常`XmlDocument`返回到其原始状态。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the current node.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前节点的类型。

trans-unit.source: The node type.
trans-unit.target: 节点类型。

trans-unit.source: For <see langword="XmlDocument" /> nodes, this value is XmlNodeType.Document.
trans-unit.target: 对于 <see langword="XmlDocument" /> 节点，该值是 XmlNodeType.Document。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDocument" /> to which the current node belongs.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前节点所属的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDocument" />。

trans-unit.source: For <see langword="XmlDocument" /> nodes (<see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlDocument.NodeType" /> equals XmlNodeType.Document), this property always returns <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 对于 <see langword="XmlDocument" /> 节点（<see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlDocument.NodeType" /> 等于 XmlNodeType.Document），该属性总是返回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the parent node of this node (for nodes that can have parents).
trans-unit.target: 获取该节点的父节点（针对可以拥有父级的节点）。

trans-unit.source: Always returns <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 始终返回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to preserve white space in element content.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否在元素内容中保留空白区域。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to preserve white space; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示保留空白；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property determines how white space is handled during the load and save process.
trans-unit.target: 此属性确定在加载过程中如何处理空白区域，并保存过程。

trans-unit.source: If `PreserveWhitespace` is `true` before <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Load%2A> or <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.LoadXml%2A> is called, white space nodes are preserved; otherwise, if this property is `false`, significant white space is preserved, white space is not.
trans-unit.target: 如果`PreserveWhitespace`是`true`之前<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Load%2A>或<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.LoadXml%2A>是调用，空白节点是保留; 否则为如果此属性为`false`（保留有效空白) 的空白区域不是。

trans-unit.source: If `PreserveWhitespace` is `true` before <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Save%2A> is called, white space in the document is preserved in the output; otherwise, if this property is `false`, `XmlDocument` auto-indents the output.
trans-unit.target: 如果`PreserveWhitespace`是`true`之前<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Save%2A>是调用，在文档中的空白是保留在输出中; 否则为如果此属性为`false`，`XmlDocument`自动缩进输出。

trans-unit.source: This method is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM).
trans-unit.target: 此方法是 Microsoft 扩展到文档对象模型 (DOM)。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to strip white space from a file.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何最小化文件中的空白区域。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the file `book.xml` as input.
trans-unit.target: 该示例使用文件`book.xml`作为输入。

trans-unit.source: The XML source
trans-unit.target: XML 源

trans-unit.source: Creates an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNode" /> object based on the information in the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" />.
trans-unit.target: 根据 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 中的信息创建一个 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNode" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The reader must be positioned on a node or attribute.
trans-unit.target: 读取器必须定位在节点或属性上。

trans-unit.source: The new <see langword="XmlNode" /> or <see langword="null" /> if no more nodes exist.
trans-unit.target: 新的 <see langword="XmlNode" />；如果不存在其他节点，则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Reads one `XmlNode` from the given reader and positions the reader on the next node.
trans-unit.target: 读取一个`XmlNode`从给定的读取器和将读取器定位到下一个节点。

trans-unit.source: This method creates the type of `XmlNode` matching the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.NodeType%2A> on which the reader is currently positioned.
trans-unit.target: 此方法创建的一种`XmlNode`匹配<xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.NodeType%2A>当前定位读取器。

trans-unit.source: (If the reader is in the initial state, `ReadNode` advances the reader to the first node and then operates on that node.)
trans-unit.target: (如果在读取器处于初始状态，`ReadNode`将读取器推进到第一个节点，然后在该节点上进行操作。)

trans-unit.source: If the reader is positioned on the start of an element, `ReadNode` reads all the attributes and any child nodes, up to and including the end tag of the current node.
trans-unit.target: 如果读取器定位在的开始处的元素，`ReadNode`读取所有属性和任何子节点，最多，并包括当前节点的结束标记。

trans-unit.source: The `XmlNode` returned contains the sub-tree representing everything read.
trans-unit.target: `XmlNode`返回包含表示所读取所有内容的子树。

trans-unit.source: The reader is positioned immediately after the end tag.
trans-unit.target: 读取器定位立即结束标记后面。

trans-unit.source: `ReadNode` can also read attributes, but in this case it does not advance the reader to the next attribute.
trans-unit.target: `ReadNode` 此外可以读取属性，但在这种情况下它不会不使读取器前进到下一个属性。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to write the following C# code:
trans-unit.target: 此选项，可以编写以下 C# 代码：

trans-unit.source: `ReadNode` does consume the attribute value though, which means after calling `ReadNode` on an attribute, <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadAttributeValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: `ReadNode` 未使用的属性值但是，这意味着在调用`ReadNode`特性，<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadAttributeValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses `ReadNode` to create a new node and then inserts the new node into the document.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用`ReadNode`以创建一个新的节点，然后插入到文档中的新节点。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the file, `cd.xml`, as input.
trans-unit.target: 该示例使用文件，`cd.xml`作为输入。

trans-unit.source: The reader is positioned on a node type that does not translate to a valid DOM node (for example, EndElement or EndEntity).
trans-unit.target: 此读取器位于未转换为有效的 DOM 节点（例如，EndElement 或 EndEntity）的节点类型上。

trans-unit.source: This method has an inheritance demand.
trans-unit.target: 此方法具有继承要求。

trans-unit.source: Full trust is required to override the <see langword="ReadNode" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 完全信任需重写<see langword="ReadNode" />方法。

trans-unit.source: This method is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM).
trans-unit.target: 此方法是 Microsoft 扩展到文档对象模型 (DOM)。

trans-unit.source: Saves the XML document to the specified location.
trans-unit.target: 将 XML 文档保存到指定的位置。

trans-unit.source: The stream to which you want to save.
trans-unit.target: 要保存到其中的流。

trans-unit.source: Saves the XML document to the specified stream.
trans-unit.target: 将 XML 文档保存到指定的流。

trans-unit.source: White space is preserved only if <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.PreserveWhitespace%2A> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 仅当保留空白<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.PreserveWhitespace%2A>设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: The XmlDeclaration of the current `XmlDocument` object determines the encoding attribute in the saved document.
trans-unit.target: 当前的 XmlDeclaration`XmlDocument`对象确定已保存的文档中的编码属性。

trans-unit.source: The value of the encoding attribute is taken from the <xref:System.Xml.XmlDeclaration.Encoding%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 编码属性的值取自<xref:System.Xml.XmlDeclaration.Encoding%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: If the `XmlDocument` does not have an XmlDeclaration, or if the XmlDeclaration does not have an encoding attribute, the saved document will not have one either.
trans-unit.target: 如果`XmlDocument`未没有出 XmlDeclaration，或如果 XmlDeclaration 没有出编码方式特性，保存的文档将不具有一个。

trans-unit.source: When the document is saved, xmlns attributes are generated to persist the node identity (local name + namespace URI) correctly.
trans-unit.target: 保存文档后，会生成的 xmlns 属性来正确保持节点标识 （本地名称 + 命名空间 URI）。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following C# code
trans-unit.target: 例如，下面的 C# 代码

trans-unit.source: generates this xmls attribute `<item xmls="urn:1"/>`.
trans-unit.target: 生成此 xml 属性`<item xmls="urn:1"/>`。

trans-unit.source: This method is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM).
trans-unit.target: 此方法是 Microsoft 扩展到文档对象模型 (DOM)。

trans-unit.source: Note that only the <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Save%2A> method enforces a well-formed XML document.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，只有<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Save%2A>方法强制执行格式良好的 XML 文档。

trans-unit.source: All other `Save` overloads only guarantee a well-formed fragment.
trans-unit.target: 所有其他`Save`重载只能保证格式良好的片段。

trans-unit.source: The operation would not result in a well formed XML document (for example, no document element or duplicate XML declarations).
trans-unit.target: 该操作不会生成格式标准的 XML 文档（例如，没有文档元素或 XML 声明重复）。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="TextWriter" /> to which you want to save.
trans-unit.target: 要保存到其中的 <see langword="TextWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: Saves the XML document to the specified <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" />.
trans-unit.target: 将 XML 文档保存到指定的 <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: The encoding on the `TextWriter` determines the encoding that is written out (The encoding of the XmlDeclaration node is replaced by the encoding of the `TextWriter`).
trans-unit.target: 中的编码`TextWriter`确定写出的编码 (XmlDeclaration 节点的编码进行编码的替换`TextWriter`)。

trans-unit.source: If there was no encoding specified on the `TextWriter`, the `XmlDocument` is saved without an encoding attribute.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有指定在没有编码`TextWriter`、`XmlDocument`保存时没有出编码方式特性。

trans-unit.source: This method is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM).

trans-unit.source: Saves the XML document to the specified file.

trans-unit.source: If the specified file exists, this method overwrites it.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在指定文件，则此方法会覆盖它。

trans-unit.source: White space is preserved in the output file only if <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.PreserveWhitespace%2A> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 在输出文件才保留空白<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.PreserveWhitespace%2A>设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: The XmlDeclaration of the current `XmlDocument` object determines the encoding attribute in the saved document.
trans-unit.target: 当前的 XmlDeclaration`XmlDocument`对象确定已保存的文档中的编码属性。

trans-unit.source: The value of the encoding attribute is taken from the <xref:System.Xml.XmlDeclaration.Encoding%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 编码属性的值取自<xref:System.Xml.XmlDeclaration.Encoding%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: If the `XmlDocument` does not have an XmlDeclaration, or if the XmlDeclaration does not have an encoding attribute, the saved document will not have one either.
trans-unit.target: 如果`XmlDocument`未没有出 XmlDeclaration，或如果 XmlDeclaration 没有出编码方式特性，保存的文档将不具有一个。

trans-unit.source: When the document is saved, xmlns attributes are generated to persist the node identity (local name + namespace URI) correctly.
trans-unit.target: 保存文档后，会生成的 xmlns 属性来正确保持节点标识 （本地名称 + 命名空间 URI）。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" /> object associated with this <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置与此 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDocument" /> 关联的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" /> object containing the XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) schemas associated with this <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDocument" />; otherwise, an empty <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 为一个包含与此 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" /> 关联的 XML 架构定义语言 (XSD) 架构的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDocument" /> 对象；否则，为一个空 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The schemas contained in an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> object associated with an <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> object are used for validation when the <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Validate%2A> method of an <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> is executed.
trans-unit.target: 中包含的架构<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>与关联的对象<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>对象用于验证时<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Validate%2A>方法<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>执行。

trans-unit.source: When an <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> object is initialized with XML data from an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object, the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> object is loaded from the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings.Schemas%2A> property of the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>初始化对象时，从 XML 数据<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>对象，<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>对象加载从<xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings.Schemas%2A>属性<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>对象。

trans-unit.source: Validates the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDocument" /> against the XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) schemas contained in the <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Schemas" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 验证 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDocument" /> 是不是 <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Schemas" /> 属性中包含的 XML 架构定义语言 (XSD) 架构。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler" /> object that receives information about schema validation warnings and errors.
trans-unit.target: 接收有关架构验证警告和错误的信息的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Validates the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDocument" /> against the XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) schemas contained in the <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Schemas" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 验证 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDocument" /> 是不是 <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Schemas" /> 属性中包含的 XML 架构定义语言 (XSD) 架构。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Validate%2A> method validates the XML data in the <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> against the schemas contained in the <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Schemas%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Validate%2A>方法验证中的 XML 数据<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>中包含的架构针对<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Schemas%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Validate%2A> method performs infoset augmentation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Validate%2A>方法执行信息集增加。

trans-unit.source: Specifically, after successful validation, schema defaults are applied, text values are converted to atomic values as necessary, and type information is associated with validated information items.
trans-unit.target: 具体而言，成功验证之后，将应用架构默认值、 文本值转换为所需的原子值和类型信息与经过验证的信息项关联。

trans-unit.source: The result is a previously un-typed XML sub-tree in the <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> replaced with a typed sub-tree.
trans-unit.target: 结果是以前非类型化中的 XML 子树<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>替换为类型化的子树。

trans-unit.source: The following are important notes to consider when using the <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Validate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 以下是使用时要考虑的重要说明<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Validate%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Schema location hints like `xsi:schemaLocation` or `xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation` are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 架构位置提示喜欢`xsi:schemaLocation`或`xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation`将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Inline schemas are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 将忽略内联架构。

trans-unit.source: If schema validation errors occur during validation the <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> becomes partially validated with some nodes with correct type information and some without.
trans-unit.target: 如果在验证期间出现架构验证错误<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>其中某些节点，使用正确的类型信息而另一些而无需将成为部分验证。

trans-unit.source: The validation process includes checking for uniqueness and reference constraints (`xs:ID`, `xs:IDREF`, `xs:key`, `xs:keyref`, and `xs:unique`).
trans-unit.target: 验证过程包括检查唯一性和引用约束 (`xs:ID`， `xs:IDREF`， `xs:key`， `xs:keyref`，和`xs:unique`)。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates use of the <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Validate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例阐释了 <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Validate%2A> 方法的用法。

trans-unit.source: The example creates an <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> that contains an associated XSD schema using the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings> and <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> objects.
trans-unit.target: 该示例创建<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>，其中包含关联的 XSD 架构使用<xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings>和<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>对象。

trans-unit.source: The example then uses the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> class to incorrectly modify the typed value of an element in the XML document generating a schema validation error.
trans-unit.target: 然后该示例使用<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>类错误地修改生成架构验证错误的 XML 文档中的某个元素的类型化的值。

trans-unit.source: The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` and `contosoBooks.xsd` files as input.
trans-unit.target: 该示例使用`contosoBooks.xml`和`contosoBooks.xsd`文件作为输入。

trans-unit.source: A schema validation event occurred and no <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler" /> object was specified.
trans-unit.target: 发生了架构验证事件且未指定 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler" /> object that receives information about schema validation warnings and errors.
trans-unit.target: 接收有关架构验证警告和错误的信息的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNode" /> object created from an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDocument" /> to validate.
trans-unit.target: 从 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDocument" /> 创建的要验证的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNode" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Validates the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNode" /> object specified against the XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) schemas in the <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Schemas" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 根据 <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Schemas" /> 属性中的 XML 架构定义语言 (XSD) 架构，验证指定的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNode" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Validate%2A> method validates the XML data in the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode> object against the schemas contained in the <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Schemas%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Validate%2A>方法验证中的 XML 数据<xref:System.Xml.XmlNode>对象中包含的架构针对<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Schemas%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Validate%2A> method performs infoset augmentation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Validate%2A>方法执行信息集增加。

trans-unit.source: Specifically, after successful validation, schema defaults are applied, text values are converted to atomic values as necessary, and type information is associated with validated information items.
trans-unit.target: 具体而言，成功验证之后，将应用架构默认值、 文本值转换为所需的原子值和类型信息与经过验证的信息项关联。

trans-unit.source: The result is a previously un-typed XML sub-tree in the <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> replaced with a typed sub-tree.
trans-unit.target: 结果是以前非类型化中的 XML 子树<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>替换为类型化的子树。

trans-unit.source: The following are important notes to consider when using the <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Validate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 以下是使用时要考虑的重要说明<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Validate%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Schema location hints like `xsi:schemaLocation` or `xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation` are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 架构位置提示喜欢`xsi:schemaLocation`或`xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation`将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Inline schemas are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 将忽略内联架构。

trans-unit.source: If schema validation errors occur during validation the <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> becomes partially validated with some nodes with correct type information and some without.
trans-unit.target: 如果在验证期间出现架构验证错误<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>其中某些节点，使用正确的类型信息而另一些而无需将成为部分验证。

trans-unit.source: If the node to validate is the root node, the validation process includes checking for uniqueness and reference constraints (`xs:ID`, `xs:IDREF`, `xs:key`, `xs:keyref`, and `xs:unique`); otherwise, uniqueness and reference constraints are omitted.
trans-unit.target: 如果要验证的节点是根节点，则验证过程包括检查唯一性和引用约束 (`xs:ID`， `xs:IDREF`， `xs:key`， `xs:keyref`，和`xs:unique`); 否则为唯一性和引用省略约束。

trans-unit.source: For an example of the <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Validate%2A> method, see the <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Validate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 有关的示例<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Validate%2A>方法，请参阅<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Validate%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNode" /> object parameter was not created from an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNode" /> 对象参数不是创建自 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDocument" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNode" /> object parameter is not an element, attribute, document fragment, or the root node.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNode" /> 对象参数不是元素、特性、文档片段或根节点。

trans-unit.source: A schema validation event occurred and no <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler" /> object was specified.
trans-unit.target: 发生了架构验证事件且未指定 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="XmlWriter" /> to which you want to save.
trans-unit.target: 要保存到其中的 <see langword="XmlWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: Saves all the children of the <see langword="XmlDocument" /> node to the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see langword="XmlDocument" /> 节点的所有子级保存到指定的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> 中。

trans-unit.source: This method is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM).
trans-unit.target: 此方法是 Microsoft 扩展到文档对象模型 (DOM)。

trans-unit.source: It is functionally equivalent to the <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.InnerXml%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 它在功能上等效于<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.InnerXml%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlDeclaration.Encoding%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property determines the encoding that is written out. If the `Encoding` property does not have a value, the `XmlDocument` is written out without an encoding attribute.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlDeclaration.Encoding%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性确定写出的编码。如果`Encoding`属性不具有一个值，`XmlDocument`而无需编码属性形式写出。

trans-unit.source: The following example displays the document onscreen.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例显示在屏幕上的文档。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="XmlWriter" /> to which you want to save.
trans-unit.target: 要保存到其中的 <see langword="XmlWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: Saves the <see langword="XmlDocument" /> node to the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see langword="XmlDocument" /> 节点保存到指定的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM).
trans-unit.target: 此方法是 Microsoft 扩展到文档对象模型 (DOM)。

trans-unit.source: It is functionally equivalent to the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.OuterXml%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 它在功能上等效于<xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.OuterXml%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlDeclaration.Encoding%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property determines the encoding that is written out. If the `Encoding` property does not have a value, the `XmlDocument` is written out without an encoding attribute.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlDeclaration.Encoding%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性确定写出的编码。如果`Encoding`属性不具有一个值，`XmlDocument`而无需编码属性形式写出。

trans-unit.source: The following example displays the document onscreen.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例显示在屏幕上的文档。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlResolver" /> to use for resolving external resources.
trans-unit.target: 设置 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlResolver" /> 以用于解析外部资源。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="XmlResolver" /> to use.
trans-unit.target: 要使用的 <see langword="XmlResolver" />。

trans-unit.source: In version 1.1 of the.NET Framework, the caller must be fully trusted in order to specify an <see langword="XmlResolver" />.
trans-unit.target: 在 .NET Framework 1.1 版中，调用方必须受到完全信任才能指定 <see langword="XmlResolver" />。

trans-unit.source: The `XmlResolver` can be used to load DTDs or expand entity references.
trans-unit.target: `XmlResolver`用于加载 Dtd 或展开实体引用。

trans-unit.source: Using the <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver.Credentials%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property, you can set credentials on the `XmlResolver` to access resources stored on a secure network resource.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver.Credentials%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性，你可以上设置凭据`XmlResolver`存储在一个安全的网络资源的访问资源。

trans-unit.source: If the document was not loaded using an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> (that is, if it was loaded using a stream, file, and so on) the `XmlResolver` on the `XmlDocument` is always used.
trans-unit.target: 如果不使用加载该文档<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>（即，如果它使用流进行加载，文件，依次类推）`XmlResolver`上`XmlDocument`始终使用。

trans-unit.source: If the document was loaded with an <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader>, the resolver on the `XmlTextReader` is used to resolve any DTD references in the DocumentType node.
trans-unit.target: 如果文档加载与<xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader>上的解析器`XmlTextReader`用于解析 DocumentType 节点中的任何 DTD 引用。

trans-unit.source: The resolver on the `XmlDocument` is used to expand any entity references.
trans-unit.target: 上的解析器`XmlDocument`用于展开的任何实体引用。

trans-unit.source: If the document was loaded with an <xref:System.Xml.XmlValidatingReader>, the resolver on the `XmlDocument` is never used.
trans-unit.target: 如果文档加载与<xref:System.Xml.XmlValidatingReader>上的解析器`XmlDocument`从未使用过。

trans-unit.source: If the document was loaded with a class that extends `XmlReader` and the `XmlReader` cannot resolve entities (<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.CanResolveEntity%2A> returns `false`), the `XmlResolver` on the `XmlDocument` is used to resolve any references in the DocumentType node and to expand any entity references.
trans-unit.target: 如果文档加载时与扩展的类的`XmlReader`和`XmlReader`无法解析实体 (<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.CanResolveEntity%2A>返回`false`)，则`XmlResolver`上`XmlDocument`用于解析 DocumentType 节点中的任何引用并展开任何实体引用。

trans-unit.source: If the `XmlDocument` is loaded using an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> which had an `XmlResolver` set to it, the `XmlResolver` on the `XmlReader` is not cached by the `XmlDocument` after <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Load%2A> completes.
trans-unit.target: 如果`XmlDocument`使用加载<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>销售额`XmlResolver`设置为，`XmlResolver`上`XmlReader`不缓存`XmlDocument`后<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Load%2A>完成。

trans-unit.source: In version 1.1 of the.NET Framework, if this property is not set, the trust level of the application determines the default behavior.
trans-unit.target: 在.net Framework 1.1 版中，如果未设置此属性，应用程序的信任级别将确定的默认行为。

trans-unit.source: `Fully trusted code:` The document uses a default <xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver> with no user credentials.
trans-unit.target: `Fully trusted code:` 文档是否使用默认<xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver>使用没有用户凭据。

trans-unit.source: If authentication is required to access a network resource, use the `XmlResolver` property to specify an `XmlResolver` with the necessary credentials.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要身份验证来访问网络资源，使用`XmlResolver`属性指定`XmlResolver`使用必要的凭据。

trans-unit.source: `Semi-trusted code:` The `XmlResolver` property is set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: `Semi-trusted code:` `XmlResolver`属性设置为`null`。

trans-unit.source: External resources are not resolved.
trans-unit.target: 不解析外部资源。

trans-unit.source: For more information on security and the `XmlResolver` property, see [Resolving External Resources](~/docs/standard/data/xml/resolving-external-resources.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息安全和`XmlResolver`属性，请参阅[解析外部资源](~/docs/standard/data/xml/resolving-external-resources.md)。

trans-unit.source: This property is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM).
trans-unit.target: 此属性是文档对象模型 (DOM) 的 Microsoft 扩展。

trans-unit.target: 下面的示例加载一个 XML 文档，其中包括对 DTD 文件的引用。

trans-unit.target: `XmlResolver`属性用于设置访问网络资源所需的凭据。

trans-unit.target: 该示例使用以下数据文件

trans-unit.target: 该属性被设置为 <see langword="null" /> 并且遇到了外部 DTD 或实体。
